{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cleft lip and palate is a common congenital disorder. It is not caused by a single gene (monogenic) or linked to sex chromosomes (sex linked). While it does have a genetic component, it is also influenced by environmental factors. This means it is not purely polygenic either. Therefore, the inheritance of cleft lip and palate is best described as multifactorial, involving both genetic and environmental factors.", "answer_choice": "C"}
